= Tools for the Welkin Standard =

These tools are used for several tasks
in the Welkin Standard.

You will need the following prequisites:
* [[Python 3.13|https://www.python.org/]].
* [[uv|https://docs.astral.sh/uv/getting-started/installation/#standalone-installer]].

Here are the available tasks:
* Generate HTML files: <code> python main.py </code>.

Tasks that should only be run automatically:
* REUSE compliance: <code> reuse lint </code>.
